mainText:
My first ever computer was an Apple. This was when I was 8 years old. Since then, I've flip flopped between Mac and pc, but always wound up back with my macs. As a multimedia developer, the technologies that Steve has been such a huge part of creating have not only assisted with my job, but Steve himself has inspired me to continually push my everyday projects to the next level. 

Thank you, Steve, for the tools to make a living and the inspiration to sculpt a career.
author: James
